page.title: 14THE A5 AT NESSCLIFFE
page.content: The A5 in one way is a pain because I can't play with my friends on the Crescent because Mum has to cross me over and sometimes she is too busy. In the early morning there is not much traffic except for in the summer when people are going away on holiday. When it rains I get splashed by the fast cars and lorries. The pubs are in the right places for people to get a drink or meal and so is the garage for getting petrol easily. Lots of people go too fast on the A5 sometimes they crash but it serves them right for going too fast on the slippery busy roads. We counted traffic on the A5 for 5 mins every 3 hrs on June lO. S= Shrewsbury, O = Oswestry. 9am S 36, O 53; llam S 47, O ll; lpm S 5l, O 39; 3pm S l5, O 5l.
